duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with site leadership on quality and Customer Experience metrics, including the root cause analysis of problem areas.
Streamline logistics in the operation through the implementation of standard work and team leadership.
Support and commit to all safety programs and OSHA compliance to ensure a safe work environment for all associates.
Proactively identify and lead process improvement initiatives and Lean tools.
Lead a team of Transportation Associates to ensure Amazon customers receive their orders on time.
Ensure proper training and address the needs of Transportation Associates to enhance their performance.
Lead change and innovation at internet speed in the logistics and transportation department.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree, or 2+ years of Amazon (blue badge/FTE) experience
